## Arc2 class

This represents an arc in a 2d space.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Arc2 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(startPoint, midPoint, endPoint)](./decentraland-ecs.arc2.(constructor).md) |  | Creates an Arc object from the three given points : start, middle and end. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [angle](./decentraland-ecs.arc2.angle.md) |  | <code>Angle</code> | Defines the angle of the arc (from mid point to end point). |
|  [centerPoint](./decentraland-ecs.arc2.centerpoint.md) |  | <code>Vector2</code> | Defines the center point of the arc. |
|  [endPoint](./decentraland-ecs.arc2.endpoint.md) |  | <code>Vector2</code> | Defines the end point of the arc |
|  [midPoint](./decentraland-ecs.arc2.midpoint.md) |  | <code>Vector2</code> | Defines the mid point of the arc |
|  [orientation](./decentraland-ecs.arc2.orientation.md) |  | <code>Orientation</code> | Defines the orientation of the arc (clock wise/counter clock wise). |
|  [radius](./decentraland-ecs.arc2.radius.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Defines the radius of the arc. |
|  [startAngle](./decentraland-ecs.arc2.startangle.md) |  | <code>Angle</code> | Defines the start angle of the arc (from start point to middle point). |
|  [startPoint](./decentraland-ecs.arc2.startpoint.md) |  | <code>Vector2</code> | Defines the start point of the arc |
